name: Caroline Kennedy
abstract: Caroline Bouvier Kennedy is an American author and attorney. She is a member of the influential Kennedy family and the only living child of U.S. President John F. Kennedy and First Lady Jacqueline Bouvier Kennedy.
related_searches: John F. Kennedy is Caroline Kennedy's father.
Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis is Caroline Kennedy's mother.
John F. Kennedy, Jr. is Caroline Kennedy's brother.
Edwin Schlossberg is Caroline Kennedy's spouse.
related_books: Listening In: The Secret White House Recordings of John F. Kennedy (2012)
